thread.title: ​Soon You'll Be Able to Charge Your Phone Simply By Entering a Room | Men’s Health
thread.title_full: ​Soon You'll Be Able to Charge Your Phone Simply By Entering a Room | Men’s Health

title: ​Soon You'll Be Able to Charge Your Phone Simply By Entering a Room | Men’s Health
text:
Your Privacy Rights Canadian Customers 
We’ve all been there: The low battery indicator blips on and suddenly, your phone shuts off and your world turns upside down. You kill the WiFi and Bluetooth, but there’s nothing more you can do as your portal to the outside world slowly and inevitably dies . Dramatic? Sure, but the enterprising folks at Disney Research have devised a way to keep your phone alive forever with their wireless charging room. Arts Technica UK reports the living room juices up to 10 objects, including a smartphone and an RC car, sans power cords. Enter the room and let your thirsty phone soak up 1900 watts of sweet electricity—perfect for firing off that Instagram post before #ThrowbackThursday ends. Advertisement
